Method Detail

initialize

protected void initialize() throws java.lang.InstantiationException
Initialize this instance. This is called in the DObject constructor, and it allows subclasses to call arbitrary initialization code. The implementation for this class is to do nothing, as all critical initialization is done within the DObject constructor
Throws:
java.lang.InstantiationException - can be thrown if some problem with initialization
